metadata.description: Red Bull Battle Grounds 2015: Star Craft II In Toronto, Canada, a fierce battle rages on as hundreds of warriors seek the ultimate prizethe Battle Grounds trophy! Competitors from around the world, weary and nearly defeated, team up to create the Archons. This new power is immensely strong, but will it be enough to overcome those in their path? Meanwhile, reigning 2014 champ Bomber watches from his spaceship above, searching for worthy challengers . . .
metadata.name: Red Bull's E-Sport Comic: The Fateful 8
